quote: The beauty of being a woman, as the French say, ""of a certain age"", is that I can be invisible. Young people, both men and women, look right through me, unless I make the effort to be noticed.
quote_letters: THE BEAUTY OF BEING A WOMAN AS THE FRENCH SAY OF A CERTAIN AGE IS THAT I CAN BE INVISIBLE YOUNG PEOPLE BOTH MEN AND WOMEN LOOK RIGHT THROUGH ME UNLESS I MAKE THE EFFORT TO BE NOTICED
